meanings.definition: Making something beautiful or more attractive.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys beautifying her garden with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The artist is beautifying the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The beautifying process of adding glitter to the painting made it sparkle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like beautifying the room with sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The beautifying effect of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The act of improving the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The beautifying of the park involved planting new trees and flowers.
meanings.sent2: She specializes in the beautifying of homes through interior design.
meanings.sent3: The beautifying of the cake with frosting turned it into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a beautifying impact on the morale of the team.
meanings.sent5: The beautifying of the city streets with colorful murals brought joy to the residents.
